features: Antique-Style Paper and Envelopes: Add a decorative and personal touch to your party invitations, announcements, or handwritten greeting cards for friends and family with this aged paper
Easy Customization: Our old paper for letters features an aged design for handwritten letters, pen pals, scrapbooks, scavenger hunt maps, wedding invitations, vows, and ceremony programs
Printer-Friendly: Our letter paper sheets are compatible with both inkjet and laser printers; they are also ideal for hand lettering, typewriting, and calligraphy
Dimensions: The love letter paper measures 21.5 x 28 cm; our vintage-style envelopes are made with thick 120gsm paper, and our double-sided writing paper is 100gsm
Comes With: You will receive 48 sheets of stationery paper and 48 corresponding v-flap envelopes, 96 pieces total; more than enough to design and create custom invitations, letters, and notes
body.description: If you want something extraordinary to make your friends and family feel special, this 96-piece old fashion stationery paper and envelopes set is perfect. This 96-piece vintage-style stationary paper for writing letters is ideal for creating custom party invitations, thank-you notes, or save-the-dates. You can whip out some exciting pirate-themed parties, Halloween invitations, or anniversaries with the aged design. Each sheet measures 21.5 x 28 cm and has plenty of space for personalized designs, stickers, stamps, and photos. If you want to create something unique on your computer or laptop - this printable paper is compatible with inkjet and laser printers. Whether it's a 'thank you' note to your friend or a Save the Date card for your guests, this nostalgic set will help you create something unique and special. Just imagine the surprise of your loved ones when they open their mailbox to see a handwritten letter in an old-fashioned look on a crisp stationery paper piece. Get creative - design it your way. Send that special something with this vintage-style paper and envelopes set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun to use!
reviews.reviewText: People seem to like receiving these letters and envelopes, especially when they’re hand written! I recommend them if you enjoy writing like I do! Don’t get me wrong, they also work well in the printer! I’m just old school.☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A variety of aged paper and envelopes
reviews.reviewText: These worked perfectly for invitations for a Harry Potter scavenger hunt I planned for our grandchildren. The paper quality is just average, but text and images printed well on my inkjet printer. There are about 6 different looks in the set, including stained-looking, slightly wrinkled, and so on, and envelopes that match the patterns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I pair these with my wax seal and quill pen to exchange letter with friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Before You Buy.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice set with good paper however if your looking for the feel of old paper then keep looking, this is standard modern paper with printed texture but it’s still good for, parties, L.A.R.P, and being on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I needed some stationery to either write a note or print a note

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Retro in style!
reviews.reviewText: This senior citizen decided to go retro. Cutting down on cell texting and email. I am now writing the old fashion way to my family and friends. I do however have to use my keyboard to type my letters out. Letter writing keeps the mind sharper and lets us use words that truly convey our appreciation to our loved ones, family and friends. This product is wonderfully priced and great quality. I will definitely be purchasing more. If only the company had a catalog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unique but envelopes and paper do not color match
reviews.reviewText: Unique paper, but none of the envelopes match the stationary sheets. 3 stars because I still used the paper and recipients seemed to enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed something classy to send acknowledgements after my wife passed suddenly. This packett fit the bill and I was very pleased with the quality and weight.
Beau papier pour donner un effet spécial. Contrairement à l'image, les enveloppes ne sont pas assorties au papier à lettre. Mais ça n'enlève rien au bel effet que ça donne.
Un paquete de hojas con todo el estilo vintage que buscas, exelente producto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my father as a part of a gift and he was really pleased with them.There are 6 slightly different designs of paper and matching envelopes all made to look weathered and old, which is great for the almost forgotten art of letter writing , calligraphy or for scrap booking or printing certificates.The paper is of good thickness and it's size is approximate to A4. The colour effect is also printed on both sides, unlike some vintage papers that I've seen which is white on one side.There are 6 sheets of paper in each design and 48 envelopes in the 6 designs, so 96 pieces in total.Good quality and worth the money. I would definitely buy again. (The photo shows a folded piece that was sent to me as a letter. The paper actually comes flat.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These papers and envelopes are good quality (Letter size not A4) and were used this year to create some Christmas Eve letters from Santa. They look absolutely stunning and went down very well with my customers.I struggled to find an affordable matching set of paper and envelope to keep costs down so this set was perfect.The only thing I would have liked more would have been to choose which paper to have instead of having a mixture of different ones.
Awesome paper for my daughters Harry Potter themed bday.
